permitHolder: SOUTH EAST BRONX NEIGHBORHOOD CENTER INC

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service fails to conduct and document daily health assessment of incoming children
At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children
